sense.gloss: turns and twists, ups and downs, meandering, complications, vicissitudes

r_ele.r: うよきょくせつをへて

sense.gloss: after many twists and turns, after much trouble

sdata.j: ↑幾多↑↓いくた↓の↑紆余曲折↑↓うよきょくせつ↓を↑経↑↓へ↓て↑条約↑↓じょうやく↓は↑締結↑↓ていけつ↓されるに↑至↑↓いた↓った。
sdata.e: The treaty has been concluded after many twists and turns.

sdata.j: あの↑問題↑↓もんだい↓も、↑紆余曲折↑↓うよきょくせつ↓を↑経↑↓へ↓て↑解決↑↓かいけつ↓した。
sdata.e: There were a lot of twists and turns to the story, but we finally solved the problem.

words.gloss: turns and twists, ups and downs, meandering, complications, vicissitudes
